org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream.ConnectedDataStream

    Package Description
    org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream  

    • Uses of ConnectedDataStream in org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream

      Subclasses of ConnectedDataStream in org.apache.flink.streaming.api.datastream 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  CoBatchedDataStream<IN1,IN2>
      A CoBatchedDataStream represents a two data stream whose elements are batched together in sliding batches.
      class  CoWindowDataStream<IN1,IN2>
      A CoWindowDataStream represents two data streams whose elements are batched together into sliding windows.
